name: Flipper Soccer
description:
Explore the exciting world of football in a new format with Flipper Soccer - an electrifying game that combines the classic pinball game with the intense action of the world's most popular sport. Play in a quick and thrilling match against a carefully chosen opponent - whether a close friend or the computer itself - and use your quick reflexes and strategic skills to control the flippers and score goals. With beautiful graphics and immersive sound effects, Flipper Soccer offers a unique and exciting experience for football and pinball lovers.

Main Features:

  • Five different stages.
  • Three different balls.
  • Online multiplayer mode.
  • Local multiplayer mode.
  • Steam achievements.
